overview: Michelle Brown, Amy Brooke, Charlotte Vale, and Makenzee Miles star in Tough Love 19! Get ready for scenes involving dirty talk and incredibly rough sex. These gals had no idea what they were in for once they explained their mistakes to their mate. If you're into hair pulling, choking, anal sex, getting thrown around like a rag doll, you'll realize after this that everyone needs a little tough love!
title: Tough Love 19
